posts.post_content:
So... damn... useless  
  
I was not happy with this uncommon. It really just sucks. First of all, 1 damage prevention is hardly going to matter, unless you really need that last point of health or something. Even more annoying, in order to even use it, you need to waste a land you could have tapped for something better. Unless you're playing with Arabian Nights lands or something, this is going to be a waste.
